health_hazards: Reproductive Toxicity; Skin irritation; Eye irritation; Specific target organ toxicity, single exposure, Respiratory tract irritation
physical_hazards: Forms explosive mixtures with air on intense heating
Storage Use: Protected from light. Tightly closed. Keep in a well-ventilated place. Keep locked up or in an area accessible only to qualified or authorized persons.

Environmental Hazards: Do not let product enter drains
Health Hazards: Reproductive Toxicity; Skin irritation; Eye irritation; Specific target organ toxicity, single exposure, Respiratory tract irritation
Health Category: Category 2 (Skin irritation); Category 2 (Eye irritation); Category 1B (Reproductive toxicity); Category 3 (STOT SE, Respiratory system)

First Aid Measures: {'Inhalation': 'After inhalation: fresh air. Call in physician.', 'Skin Contact': 'In case of skin contact: Take off immediately all contaminated clothing. Rinse skin with water/ shower. Consult a physician.', 'Eye Contact': 'After eye contact: rinse out with plenty of water. Call in ophthalmologist. Remove contact lenses.', 'Ingestion': 'After swallowing: immediately make victim drink water (two glasses at most). Consult a physician.'}
Firefighting Measures: {'Suitable Extinguishing Media': 'Water, Foam, Carbon dioxide (CO2), Dry powder', 'Special Hazards': 'Carbon oxides, Nitrogen oxides (NOx), Combustible, Fire may cause evolution of nitrogen oxides, nitrous gases', 'Advice for Firefighters': 'Stay in danger area only with self-contained breathing apparatus.
